entry.title: St Tropez Dining Table w 4 chairs
entry.summary:
Vendor: 604wholesale
Type: Outdoor Tables & Chairs
Price: 1499.00

ST TROPEZ DINING TABLE:

Located on the French Riviera, the town of St. Tropez is associated with white sandy beaches and a warm, sunny weather. Overall, this popular tourist destination is trendy, upscale, and classy.

Simple yet sophisticated, the St. Tropez Dining set offers a modern elegance that is unsurpassed by any other. Invite your friends, its Al Fresco dining time! Ultra sleek design provides endless usage in large or small outdoor spaces.

100% Handcrafted Durable, lightweight rust-free aluminum frames All weather hand woven resin wicker is UV, stain, crack, water and split resistant for extra durability lasting powder-coat finishes Stylish contemporary design All weather fabric Comfortable, generously proportioned seating Designed to withstand frequent use and harsh elements Very easy to take care of.

Measurements are:

Armchair dimensions: 33” L x 27” W x 42.75” H
Dining table dimensions: 39” L x 39” W x 28” H

We can add an umbrella hole to the table if needed

Available in any wicker or cushion color we carry!

All weather covers available for $249 which include individual ones for the chairs

entry.title: The Sachilotto - Bar Table with 4 barstools
entry.summary:
Vendor: 604wholesale
Type: Outdoor Tables & Chairs
Price: 1699.00

THE SACHILOTTO BAR TABLE:

The Sachilotto Dining Set is great for entertaining dinner guests or a quiet meal at home. This set consists of four counter height stools and a counter height dining table. The Sachilotto is constructed with poly-wicker rattan which is maintenance free and easy to clean. The chestnut finish of the frame complements the stainless steel footrests which enhance the look of each barstool. The simple, classic lines of the Metropolis will add style and sophistication to any outdoor setting.

AVAIL IN 6 OR 8 SEATERS!

Features:
· Includes: 4 counter height stools, and counter height table with glass.
· All weather resin wicker
· Stainless steel foot rests on all barstools

Table Dimensions:
59’’L x 32’’D x 42’’H

16’’L x 16’’D x 30’’H
